quizAnswer-1498713056463-2126304033.text: For 50 seconds, don't move from your spot (unless safety requires it),

quizAnswer-1498713056463-2701204913.text: Stand up, return to mauling humans,

quizQuestion-1498713056462-927374470.text: When you're a zombie, and a human shoots you with a nerf dart, what do you do?

quizAnswer-1498713056463-203293983.text: Ask the human for their life code,

quizAnswer-1498713056463-2738318367.text: Stand up, return to mauling humans,

quizAnswer-1498713056463-556515725.text: For 50 seconds, don't move from your spot (unless safety requires it),

quizQuestion-1498713056463-4136824535.text: When you're a zombie, and you touch a human, what do you do?

quizAnswer-1498713056463-2011536219.text: Once you're across, count "3 resistance, 2 resistance, 1 resistance!" and go,

quizAnswer-1498713056463-2098410858.text: Wait until there are no more players in the crosswalk,

quizAnswer-1498713056463-2102061027.text: Get within 15 feet of a crosswalk button (now you're out of play),

quizAnswer-1498713056463-2264127866.text: When the walk signal appears, walk (not run) across the crosswalk,

quizAnswer-1498713056463-3501248564.text: Have a human count "3 resistance, 2 resistance, 1 resistance, go!" and the humans are in play,

quizAnswer-1498713056463-3590710520.text: When the humans go, have a zombie count "3 zombie horde, 2 zombie horde, 1 zombie horde, go!" and the zombies are in play,

quizAnswer-1498713056464-1461029743.text: Count to 15, then take off your armband,

quizAnswer-1498713056464-1696076260.text: Start walking across the street, looking both ways for cars,

quizAnswer-1498713056464-2859515280.text: Raise your nerf gun in the air so you're visible,

quizQuestion-1498713056463-703378960.text: When you want to cross the street, what do you do?
